about_the_game:
You're Trapped!



You, a professional exorcist, find yourself trapped in a house with an aggressive demon after answering what was supposed to be an ordinary job (embarrassing, right?).
The rooms are dark, and every sound you make is sure to attract attention. Stay quiet, stay low, and always keep an eye out for a way to escape or finish the job you came here to do. You'll be used like a toy if you get caught.

Explore The House



If you want to get out of here, you're going to have to get creative.
The door is locked up tighter than your captor, and you need to find all the keys and solve all the puzzles in order to open it back up.
Your surrounding environment contains not only the items needed to escape, but also those necessary to fight back.
Will you go the extra mile to collect them all and punish the demon?

Exorcise



If you manage to find a way to halt the demon, you can begin the exorcism process. Choose from a variety of player-controlled animations where you can finally return the favor and make this succubus beg.

Customize



As you view the different endings, so too will you unlock options to customize your demonic tormentor to your liking.
Some of the best options are only available to the 100%ers out there, so get to it!

content_descriptors.notes: Scenes of sexual intercourse, some driven by the player. Ability to add or remove clothing.

name: The Sexorcist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 10th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: The Sexorcist is an adult 3D survival-horror game where you outsmart, evade, and hopefully overpower the deadly succubus that has you trapped. Will you escape her clutches, or succumb to her persistence?
